docs.snippet: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., May 24--The Union of South Africa has notified the United Nations that it is willing to discuss with a special committee of five nations its former mandated territory in South-West Africa, Such talks are scheduled to open here...
docs.lead_paragraph: UNITED NATIONS, N.Y., May 24--The Union of South Africa has notified the United Nations that it is willing to discuss with a special committee of five nations its former mandated territory in South-West Africa, Such talks are scheduled to open here June 18.

headline.main: SOUTH AFRICA SET FOR MANDATE TALK; Tells U.N. It Is Willing to Meet With Committee on Question of South-West Territory

byline.original: By WALTER SULLIVAN Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges encountered another week of listless trading and insignificant price changes. Routine requirements of banks and dealers represented the major interest with limited inquiry from other sources.
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges encountered another week of listless trading and insignificant price changes. Routine requirements of banks and dealers represented the major interest with limited inquiry from other sources.

docs.lead_paragraph: Plans have been completed by Miss Jean Talcott Hibbard, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Charlton B. Hibbard of 860 Fifth Avenue and Brookfield Center, Conn., for her marriage to William T. Fleming Jr., son of Mrs. Henry W. Sage Jr. of New York and William T. Fleming of Bryn Mawr. Pa.

headline.main: JUNE 23 WEDDING FOR JEAN HIBBARD; Barnard Senior Plans to Be Married to W.T. Fleming Jr. in St. James Church Here

docs.snippet: A SPLASH of posters in Argentina's national colors of blue and white recently blazoned in  downtown Buenos Aires: "Eva Peron, standard bearer of the meek, should be elected in 1952." The meek could scarcely find in all this world a more dramatic...
docs.lead_paragraph: A SPLASH of posters in Argentina's national colors of blue and white recently blazoned in downtown Buenos Aires: "Eva Peron, standard bearer of the meek, should be elected in 1952." The meek could scarcely find in all this world a more dramatic opposite to lead them.
docs.abstract: V L Warren article on Senora Peron's influence and role; illus

headline.main: Evita for President of Argentina?; After five years, there is talk of that. It isn't likely to happen, but the talk is symbolic of the strength she wields. Evita for President?

docs.snippet: GUATEMALA, June 1--LatinAmerican Communists, already entrenched during the regime of President Juan Jose Arevalo, appear to have consolidated their position and increased their power in the ten weeks since Col. Jacobo Arbenz Guzman became Chief...
docs.lead_paragraph: GUATEMALA, June 1--LatinAmerican Communists, already entrenched during the regime of President Juan Jose Arevalo, appear to have consolidated their position and increased their power in the ten weeks since Col. Jacobo Arbenz Guzman became Chief Executive of this Central American country of 2,787,000 inhabitants.

headline.main: GUATEMALAN REDS TRADE ON OLD ILLS; Unionized Workers Falling Prey to Communist Lure After Years of Suppression Red Promises Act as Magnet Leftists Organize Indians
